prompt: Create a photo gallery viewer with a playful, pastel aesthetic. The main image, featuring a colorful flower garden, should have 16px rounded corners and a soft pink shadow (opacity 0.1, blur 8px). Include a horizontal thumbnail gallery with 5 images (75x75px, 8px corners, 8px spacing) in a pastel blue container (#B3E5FC). Place three action buttons in a centered row at the bottom: a pink heart icon (#F06292), a mint share icon (#26A69A), and a lavender download icon (#CE93D8), each in a circular container with 12px padding and a white background (#FFFFFF). Use a pastel pink scaffold background (#FCE4EC) with 16px padding. The app bar should have a pastel purple background (#E1BEE7), a white back arrow, and a title 'Pastel Gallery' in white bold text. The design should feel soft, playful, and inviting with balanced spacing.
